channel.title: Hello, I'm Derek :D
channel.description:
Hello Moparians.
I'm Derek. Figured my first post should be an introduction since I'm going to be posting a lot and you're going to be wishing I never even registered after lurking for years
I'm 24 years old, from West Virginia, United States - And I've come here because I recently decided I want to learn to code RSPS since I dabble in java script. I came in in search for a server to download so I can begin the learning process, as I am self-taught with everything I know (playing guitar was easy to learn, and so was building and maintaining computers. Coding is turning out to be a bit more complicated and sometimes I wish I had a tutor lol). So I decided to go ahead and register so I can ask questions and hopefully answer a few myself. I am a complete beginner though. I've picked up a few things since I started this journey 2 days ago but none the less, there is tons I dont know. On a scale of 1-10 - 10 being a person who can fix just about any problem and can build a server, framework and all, from the ground up, and with 0 being someone who has never heard of Eclipse/NetBeans, a .bat file or a compiler - I'd say I'm somewhere around a 2.9 at the moment.
I have no desire to host a server. I have no desire to let other people play on a server made my someone else and edited by me - I have no desire to make money off of an underground sub-culture of a British RPG that I've played for over 11 year (rs obvlsly) - I have no desires other than to learn how to code and troubleshoot - how to code and troubleshoot well so I can be of help to the developer of the server I am currently playing or any server I may play in the future. If I learn enough and get good enough to build my own server from scratch without the help or code from anyone else, then yes - I might host. But that will probably never happen and if it does, it will be years from now because I dont believe in hosting a server that you didn't make yourself. I am a musician, so you can imagine where mindset comes from with bands stealing lyrics or guitar riffs from other bands and making money from doing it.
I was going to post a picture of myself but I'm not sure if this site uses BBCode, Html or what... Maybe i'll get to that later. Anyway, just wanted to do this the right way. Now, on to the rs2 client downloads section so I can ask for help hahaha.

item.title: Hello, I'm Derek :D
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

PaulT:

Welcome to the community. Please feel free to post any questions you have. Like many of the members here, I also play guitar, build PCs, and am a pretty awesome guy.

self proclaimed awesome guy

the first signs of an awesome guy

Read full topic
